LinearLayout: <% attributes.each do |key,attribute| %> <% if attribute == 'TextView' -%> <TextView android:id="@+id/text_<%= to_snake_case(key) %>" tools:text="<%= key %>" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content"/> <% end %> <% if attribute == 'ImageView' %> <ImageView android:id="@+id/image_<%= to_snake_case(key) %>" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" tools:src="@mipmap/ic_launcher" /> <% end %> <% if attribute == 'SwitchCompat' %> <android.support.v7.widget.SwitchCompat android:id="@+id/switch_<%= to_snake_case(key) %>" tools:text="<%= key %>" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content"/> <% end %> <% if attribute == 'EditText' %> <android.support.v7.widget.AppCompatEditText android:id="@+id/edit_<%= to_snake_case(key) %>" tools:hint="<%= key %>" tools:text="<%= key %>" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:maxLines="1" android:textAppearance="@style/TextAppearance.AppCompat.Medium"/> <% end %> <% end %>
